title: The ACLU Is Of Critical Importance: A Closer Look | Henry Melcher & Will Storey: Late Night Chats
description:
Seth Meyers takes a closer look at why the ACLU is more important than ever in the age of President Trump. (This segment was originally produced for an ACLU fundraiser.)
Then, Late Night staffers Henry Melcher and Will Storey unpack what it's like to produce a guest segment for Late Night.
LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
